Class: RichResponse

RichResponse(richResponseopt)

Class for initializing and constructing Rich Responses with chainable interface.

Constructor

new RichResponse(richResponseopt)

Constructor for RichResponse. Accepts optional RichResponse to clone.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
richResponse RichResponse <optional>
 Optional RichResponse to clone.
Source:
  • response-builder.js, line 128

Members

items :Array.<RichResponseItem>

Ordered list of either SimpleResponse objects or BasicCard objects. First item must be SimpleResponse. There can be at most one card.
Type:
  • Array.<RichResponseItem>
Source:
  • response-builder.js, line 140

linkOutSuggestion :LinkOutSuggestion

Link Out Suggestion chip for this rich response. Optional.
Type:
  • LinkOutSuggestion
Source:

suggestions :Array.<Suggestion>

Ordered list of text suggestions to display. Optional.

isValidSuggestionText(suggestionText) → {boolean}

Returns true if the given suggestion text is valid to be added to the suggestion list. A valid text string is not longer than 25 characters.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
suggestionText string Text to validate as suggestion.
Source:
  • response-builder.js, line 271
Returns:
True if the text is valid, false otherwise.s
